verses.text: \w Be|strong="H1732"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, God, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* man wants \w to|strong="H5921"\w* swallow \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*. \w All|strong="H5921"\w* day \w long|strong="H7350"\w*, \w he|strong="H1732"\w* attacks \w and|strong="H1732"\w* oppresses \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* enemies want \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w swallow|strong="H7602"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w* \w up|strong="H7602"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* many \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* proudly \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.
\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am afraid, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* put \w my|strong="H3605"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* God, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* praise \w his|strong="H3117"\w* word. \w In|strong="H3117"\w* God, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* put \w my|strong="H3372"\w* trust. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3372"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*. \w What|strong="H3372"\w* can flesh do \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H3372"\w*?

\w All|strong="H6213"\w* day \w long|strong="H4100"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* twist \w my|strong="H6213"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*. \w All|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H6213"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w against|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* conspire \w and|strong="H3117"\w* lurk, watching \w my|strong="H3605"\w* steps. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* eager \w to|strong="H5921"\w* take \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.
\w Shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* escape \w by|strong="H8104"\w* iniquity? \w In|strong="H5315"\w* anger cast down \w the|strong="H8104"\w* peoples, God.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* count \w my|strong="H5921"\w* wanderings. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H3381"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* tears \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* container. Arenâ€™t \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* book?

\w Then|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* enemies \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H7760"\w* back \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* day \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* call. \w I|strong="H7760"\w* know \w this|strong="H7760"\w*: \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5612"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* God, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* word. \w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* word.

\w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* not \w be|strong="H1697"\w* afraid. \w What|strong="H1697"\w* can man \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*?

\w Your|strong="H6213"\w* vows \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w on|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w*. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H6213"\w* thank offerings \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* delivered \w my|strong="H5921"\w* soul \w from|strong="H5921"\w* death, \w and|strong="H5088"\w* prevented \w my|strong="H5921"\w* feet \w from|strong="H5921"\w* falling, \w that|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* may walk \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* light \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* living.
